description: The name of the package that this Kapp should use for display
name: Bundle Package

description: If the Kapp has custom workflow that should be executed when a form is Created, Updated, Deleted...etc)
name: Custom Form Workflow

description: Notification template used when a submission has been completed.
name: Notification Template Name - Complete

description: Notification to send when tasks are created
name: Notification Template Name - Create

description: Team that owns and manages services in this kapp (overridden by form attributes)
name: Owning Team
